mn100:2.1: dhanañjānī → dhānañjānī (pts1), cañcalikappe → maṇḍalakappe (bj) | caṇḍalakappe (si, pts1) | paccalakappe (s1-3, km)
mn100:3.4: avabhūtāva ayaṃ → avabhūtā cayaṃ (bj, pts1) | avabhūtā ca yaṃ (s1-3, km), tevijjānaṃ → idaṃ padaṃ bj, pts1 potthakesu, bhāsissatī”ti → bhāsatīti (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), parabhūtāva ayaṃ → parābhūtā ca yaṃ (s1-3, km) | parābhūtā cayaṃ (pts1)
mn100:42.2: aṭṭhitavataṃ → aṭṭhitavata (s1-3, km, pts1), sappurisavataṃ → sappurisavata (s1-3, km, pts1)
mn100:42.5: Ṭhānaso metaṃ → ṭhānaso kho panetaṃ (s1-3, km) | kho panetaṃ (mr)
mn100:42.6: adhidevā”ti → atthi devāti (bj, s1-3, km, pts1) | atidevāti (?)
mn100:42.9: puṭṭho samāno ‘atthi devā’ti yo vadeyya, ‘ṭhānaso me viditā’ti → ṭhānaso viditā me viditāti (s1-3, km, pts1) | ṭhānaso me viditā atidevāti (?)
mn100:42.12: gotamo ādikeneva na byākāsī”ti → gotamo ādikeneva byākāsīti (mr) | gotamo atthi devāti na byākāsīti (?)
